MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G67 postcode area of Cumbernauld. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.31AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required to our electrical equipment and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 9.50AM on 16 January 2021.
